Package ohos.accessibility.ability

Class AccessibilityInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.accessibility.ability.AccessibilityInfo

  • public class AccessibilityInfo
extends Object
    Provides methods for obtaining information about an accessibility node.

    The information about this accessibility node derives from a HarmonyOS application control. You can use this accessibility node to obtain information about the control on the GUI.

    Since:
    3
    SystemCapability
    SystemCapability.Accessibility#ABILITY

      • gainFocus

        public Optional<AccessibilityInfo> gainFocus​(int focusType)
        Obtains information about the node that gains accessibility focus.
        Parameters:
        focusType - Indicates the focus type, which is described in AccessibilityInfo#FOCUS_TYPE_ACCESSIBILITY.
        Returns:
        Returns information about the focused accessibility node.
        Since:
        4

      • gainNextFocus

        public Optional<AccessibilityInfo> gainNextFocus​(int direction)
        Obtains the next focused node in the specified direction of the currently focused node.
        Parameters:
        direction - Indicates the direction to obtain the next focused node. The value can be AccessibilityInfo#DIRECTION_UP, AccessibilityInfo#DIRECTION_DOWN, AccessibilityInfo#DIRECTION_LEFT, AccessibilityInfo#DIRECTION_RIGHT, AccessibilityInfo#DIRECTION_FORWARD, or AccessibilityInfo#DIRECTION_BACKWARD.
        Returns:
        Returns information about the next focused accessibility node.
        Since:
        4

      • getAccessibleInfoViaContent

        public List<AccessibilityInfo> getAccessibleInfoViaContent​(String text)
        Searches for node information based on the specified content.
        Parameters:
        text - Indicates the content used to search for node information.
        Returns:
        Returns a list of accessibility nodes.
        Since:
        4

        public boolean executeOperation​(int operation)
        Executes a specified operation.
        Parameters:
        operation - Indicates the operation type.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the operation is successfully executed; returns false otherwise.
